statements: SELECT re.PGM_SYS_ID, re.ACTIVITY_ID, re.STATE_EPA_FLAG, re.ACTIVITY_TYPE_CODE, re.ACTIVITY_TYPE_DESC, re.COMP_MONITOR_TYPE_CODE, re.COMP_MONITOR_TYPE_DESC, re.ACTUAL_END_DATE, re.PROGRAM_CODES, ee.REGISTRY_ID, ee.FAC_NAME, ee.FAC_STREET, ee.FAC_CITY, ee.FAC_STATE, ee.FAC_ZIP, ee.FAC_COUNTY, ee.FAC_EPA_REGION, ee.FAC_LAT, ee.FAC_LONG, ee.FAC_DERIVED_WBD, ee.FAC_DERIVED_CD113, ee.FAC_PERCENT_MINORITY, ee.FAC_POP_DEN, ee.FAC_DERIVED_HUC, ee.FAC_SIC_CODES, ee.FAC_NAICS_CODES, ee.DFR_URL FROM  ICIS_AIR_FCES_PCES re,  ECHO_EXPORTER ee,  EXP_PGM ep  WHERE ((ep.PGM = 'AIR_IDS') AND ((ep.REGISTRY_ID) = (ee.REGISTRY_ID)) AND (ep.PGM_ID = (re.PGM_SYS_ID)))

SELECT cf.FACILITY_NAME, cf.LOCATION_ADDRESS, cf.CITY, cf.ZIP, cf.PRIMARY_SIC_CODE, cf.PRIMARY_NAICS_CODE, ce.ACTIVITY_ID, ce.ACTIVITY_NAME, ce.STATE_CODE, ce.REGION_CODE, ce.FISCAL_YEAR, ce.CASE_NUMBER, ce.CASE_NAME, ce.ACTIVITY_TYPE_CODE, ce.ACTIVITY_TYPE_DESC, ce.ACTIVITY_STATUS_CODE, ce.ACTIVITY_STATUS_DESC, ce.ACTIVITY_STATUS_DATE, ce.LEAD, ce.CASE_STATUS_DATE, ce.DOJ_DOCKET_NMBR, ce.ENF_OUTCOME_CODE, ce.ENF_OUTCOME_DESC, ce.TOTAL_PENALTY_ASSESSED_AMT, ce.TOTAL_COST_RECOVERY_AMT, ce.TOTAL_COMP_ACTION_AMT, ce.HQ_DIVISION, ce.BRANCH, ce.VOLUNTARY_SELF_DISCLOSURE_FLAG, ce.MULTIMEDIA_FLAG, ce.ENF_SUMMARY_TEXT, ee.FAC_NAICS_CODES, ee.FAC_DERIVED_HUC, ee.FAC_NAME, ee.FAC_STREET, ee.FAC_CITY, ee.FAC_STATE, ee.FAC_ZIP, ee.FAC_COUNTY, ee.FAC_EPA_REGION, ee.FAC_SIC_CODES, ee.FAC_LAT, ee.FAC_LONG, ee.FAC_DERIVED_WBD, ee.FAC_DERIVED_CD113, ee.FAC_PERCENT_MINORITY, ee.FAC_POP_DEN FROM  CASE_FACILITIES cf,  CASE_ENFORCEMENTS ce,  ECHO_EXPORTER ee  WHERE (((cf.REGISTRY_ID) = (ee.REGISTRY_ID)) AND (ce.HQ_DIVISION = 'AIR') AND ((ce.CASE_NUMBER) = (cf.CASE_NUMBER)))

SELECT re.PGM_SYS_ID, re.ACTIVITY_ID, re.ENF_IDENTIFIER, re.ACTIVITY_TYPE_CODE, re.ACTIVITY_TYPE_DESC, re.STATE_EPA_FLAG, re.ENF_TYPE_CODE, re.ENF_TYPE_DESC, re.SETTLEMENT_ENTERED_DATE, re.PENALTY_AMOUNT, ee.REGISTRY_ID, ee.FAC_NAME, ee.FAC_STREET, ee.FAC_CITY, ee.FAC_STATE, ee.FAC_ZIP, ee.FAC_COUNTY, ee.FAC_EPA_REGION, ee.FAC_LAT, ee.FAC_LONG, ee.FAC_DERIVED_WBD, ee.FAC_DERIVED_CD113, ee.FAC_PERCENT_MINORITY, ee.FAC_POP_DEN, ee.FAC_DERIVED_HUC, ee.FAC_SIC_CODES, ee.FAC_NAICS_CODES, ee.DFR_URL FROM  ICIS_AIR_FORMAL_ACTIONS re,  ECHO_EXPORTER ee,  EXP_PGM ep  WHERE ((ep.PGM = 'AIR_IDS') AND ((ep.REGISTRY_ID) = (ee.REGISTRY_ID)) AND (ep.PGM_ID = (re.PGM_SYS_ID)))

SELECT re.REGISTRY_ID, re.PGM_SYS_ACRNM, re.PGM_SYS_ID, re.FACILITY_NAME, re.EPA_REGION_CODE, re.ACTIVITY_ID, re.ACTIVITY_TYPE_CODE, re.ACTIVITY_TYPE_DESC, re.COMP_MONITOR_UID, re.COMP_MONITOR_TYPES, re.STATUTE_CODE, re.LAW_SECTION_CODE, re.ACTUAL_BEGIN_DATE, re.ACTUAL_END_DATE, re.AGENCY, re.COMP_MONITOR_AGENCY_TYPES, ee.FAC_DERIVED_HUC, ee.FAC_NAME, ee.FAC_STREET, ee.FAC_CITY, ee.FAC_STATE, ee.FAC_SIC_CODES, ee.FAC_ZIP, ee.FAC_COUNTY, ee.FAC_EPA_REGION, ee.FAC_LAT, ee.FAC_LONG, ee.FAC_DERIVED_WBD, ee.FAC_DERIVED_CD113, ee.FAC_NAICS_CODES, ee.FAC_PERCENT_MINORITY, ee.FAC_POP_DEN FROM  ICIS_FEC_EPA_INSPECTIONS re,  ECHO_EXPORTER ee  WHERE ((re.REGISTRY_ID) = (ee.REGISTRY_ID))

SELECT re.PGM_SYS_ID, re.ACTIVITY_ID, re.AGENCY_TYPE_DESC, re.STATE_CODE, re.AIR_LCON_CODE, re.COMP_DETERMINATION_UID, re.ENF_RESPONSE_POLICY_CODE, re.PROGRAM_CODES, re.PROGRAM_DESCS, re.POLLUTANT_CODES, re.POLLUTANT_DESCS, re.EARLIEST_FRV_DETERM_DATE, re.HPV_DAYZERO_DATE, re.HPV_RESOLVED_DATE, ee.REGISTRY_ID, ee.FAC_NAME, ee.FAC_STREET, ee.FAC_CITY, ee.FAC_STATE, ee.FAC_ZIP, ee.FAC_COUNTY, ee.FAC_EPA_REGION, ee.FAC_LAT, ee.FAC_LONG, ee.FAC_DERIVED_WBD, ee.FAC_DERIVED_CD113, ee.FAC_PERCENT_MINORITY, ee.FAC_POP_DEN, ee.FAC_DERIVED_HUC, ee.FAC_SIC_CODES, ee.FAC_NAICS_CODES, ee.DFR_URL FROM  ICIS_AIR_VIOLATION_HISTORY re,  ECHO_EXPORTER ee,  EXP_PGM ep  WHERE ((ep.PGM = 'AIR_IDS') AND ((ep.REGISTRY_ID) = (ee.REGISTRY_ID)) AND (ep.PGM_ID = (re.PGM_SYS_ID)))

SELECT re.ACTIVITY_ID, re.REGION_CODE, re.FISCAL_YEAR, re.ACTIVITY_TYPE_CODE, re.ACTIVITY_TYPE_DESC, re.ACTIVITY_STATUS_CODE, re.ACTIVITY_STATUS_DESC, re.ACTIVITY_STATUS_DATE, re.LEAD, re.CASE_STATUS_DATE, re.ENF_OUTCOME_CODE, re.ENF_OUTCOME_DESC, re.TOTAL_PENALTY_ASSESSED_AMT, re.TOTAL_COST_RECOVERY_AMT, re.TOTAL_COMP_ACTION_AMT, re.VOLUNTARY_SELF_DISCLOSURE_FLAG, re.ENF_SUMMARY_TEXT, ee.FAC_NAME, ee.FAC_STREET, ee.FAC_CITY, ee.FAC_STATE, ee.FAC_ZIP, ee.FAC_COUNTY, ee.FAC_EPA_REGION, ee.FAC_LAT, ee.FAC_LONG, ee.FAC_DERIVED_WBD, ee.FAC_DERIVED_CD113, ee.FAC_PERCENT_MINORITY, ee.FAC_POP_DEN, ee.FAC_DERIVED_HUC, ee.FAC_SIC_CODES, ee.FAC_NAICS_CODES, ee.DFR_URL FROM  CASE_ENFORCEMENTS re,  ECHO_EXPORTER ee,  CASE_FACILITIES cf  WHERE (((cf.REGISTRY_ID) = (ee.REGISTRY_ID)) AND (re.ACTIVITY_ID = cf.ACTIVITY_ID))

SELECT re.NPDES_ID, re.ENF_IDENTIFIER, re.ACTIVITY_ID, re.ACTIVITY_TYPE_CODE, re.ENF_TYPE_CODE, re.ENF_TYPE_DESC, re.AGENCY, re.SETTLEMENT_ENTERED_DATE, re.FED_PENALTY_ASSESSED_AMT, re.STATE_LOCAL_PENALTY_AMT, ee.FAC_NAME, ee.FAC_STREET, ee.FAC_CITY, ee.FAC_STATE, ee.FAC_ZIP, ee.FAC_COUNTY, ee.FAC_EPA_REGION, ee.FAC_LAT, ee.FAC_LONG, ee.FAC_DERIVED_WBD, ee.FAC_DERIVED_CD113, ee.FAC_PERCENT_MINORITY, ee.FAC_POP_DEN, ee.FAC_DERIVED_HUC, ee.FAC_SIC_CODES, ee.FAC_NAICS_CODES, ee.DFR_URL FROM  NPDES_FORMAL_ENFORCEMENT_ACTIONS re,  ECHO_EXPORTER ee,  EXP_PGM ep  WHERE ((ep.PGM = 'NPDES_IDS') AND ((ep.REGISTRY_ID) = (ee.REGISTRY_ID)) AND (ep.PGM_ID = (re.NPDES_ID)))

SELECT re.REGISTRY_ID, re.NPDES_ID, re.ACTIVITY_ID, re.ACTIVITY_TYPE_CODE, re.COMP_MONITOR_TYPE_CODE, re.COMP_MONITOR_TYPE_DESC, re.STATE_EPA_FLAG, re.ACTUAL_BEGIN_DATE, re.ACTUAL_END_DATE, re.ACTIVITY_OUTCOME_CODE, re.ACTIVITY_OUTCOME_DESC, ee.FAC_NAME, ee.FAC_STREET, ee.FAC_CITY, ee.FAC_STATE, ee.FAC_ZIP, ee.FAC_COUNTY, ee.FAC_EPA_REGION, ee.FAC_LAT, ee.FAC_LONG, ee.FAC_DERIVED_WBD, ee.FAC_DERIVED_CD113, ee.FAC_PERCENT_MINORITY, ee.FAC_POP_DEN, ee.FAC_DERIVED_HUC, ee.FAC_SIC_CODES, ee.FAC_NAICS_CODES, ee.DFR_URL FROM  NPDES_INSPECTIONS re,  ECHO_EXPORTER ee,  EXP_PGM ep  WHERE ((ep.PGM = 'NPDES_IDS') AND ((ep.REGISTRY_ID) = (ee.REGISTRY_ID)) AND (ep.PGM_ID = (re.NPDES_ID)))

SELECT re.REPORTING_YEAR, re.REGISTRY_ID, re.PGM_SYS_ACRNM, re.PGM_SYS_ID, re.POLLUTANT_NAME, re.ANNUAL_EMISSION, re.UNIT_OF_MEASURE, re.NEI_TYPE, re.NEI_HAP_VOC_FLAG, ee.FAC_NAME, ee.FAC_STREET, ee.FAC_CITY, ee.FAC_STATE, ee.FAC_ZIP, ee.FAC_COUNTY, ee.FAC_EPA_REGION, ee.FAC_LAT, ee.FAC_LONG, ee.FAC_DERIVED_WBD, ee.FAC_DERIVED_CD113, ee.FAC_PERCENT_MINORITY, ee.FAC_POP_DEN, ee.FAC_DERIVED_HUC, ee.FAC_SIC_CODES, ee.FAC_NAICS_CODES, ee.DFR_URL FROM  POLL_RPT_COMBINED_EMISSIONS re,  ECHO_EXPORTER ee  WHERE ((re.REGISTRY_ID) = (ee.REGISTRY_ID))
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW temp_1 AS SELECT * FROM EXP_PGM WHERE PGM = 'NPDES_IDS';

SELECT re.ACTIVITY_ID, re.DMR_EVENT_ID, re.DMR_SAMPLE_TYPE_CODE, re.DMR_UNIT_CODE, re.DMR_UNIT_DESC, re.DMR_VALUE_ID, re.DMR_VALUE_NMBR, re.DMR_VALUE_QUALIFIER_CODE, re.DMR_VALUE_STANDARD_UNITS, re.EXCEEDENCE_PCT, re.LIMIT_BEGIN_DATE, re.LIMIT_END_DATE, re.LIMIT_UNIT_CODE, re.LIMIT_UNIT_DESC, re.LIMIT_VALUE_ID, re.LIMIT_VALUE_NMBR, re.LIMIT_VALUE_QUALIFIER_CODE, re.LIMIT_VALUE_STANDARD_UNITS, re.LIMIT_VALUE_TYPE_CODE, re.MONITORING_LOCATION_CODE, re.NODI_CODE, re.PARAMETER_CODE, re.PARAMETER_DESC, re.STANDARD_UNIT_CODE, re.STANDARD_UNIT_DESC, re.VIOLATION_CODE, re.EXTERNAL_PERMIT_NMBR, re.MONITORING_PERIOD_END_DATE, ee.FAC_NAME, ee.FAC_STREET, ee.FAC_CITY, ee.FAC_STATE, ee.FAC_ZIP, ee.FAC_COUNTY, ee.FAC_EPA_REGION, ee.FAC_LAT, ee.FAC_LONG, ee.FAC_DERIVED_WBD, ee.FAC_DERIVED_CD113, ee.FAC_PERCENT_MINORITY, ee.FAC_POP_DEN, ee.FAC_DERIVED_HUC, ee.FAC_SIC_CODES, ee.FAC_NAICS_CODES, ee.DFR_URL FROM  NPDES_DMRS_FY2020 re,  ECHO_EXPORTER ee,  temp_1 ep  WHERE ((ep.REGISTRY_ID) = (ee.REGISTRY_ID)) AND (ep.PGM_ID = (re.EXTERNAL_PERMIT_NMBR))
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW temp_1 AS SELECT * FROM EXP_PGM WHERE PGM = 'NPDES_IDS';

SELECT re.ACTIVITY_ID, re.DMR_EVENT_ID, re.DMR_SAMPLE_TYPE_CODE, re.DMR_UNIT_CODE, re.DMR_UNIT_DESC, re.DMR_VALUE_ID, re.DMR_VALUE_NMBR, re.DMR_VALUE_QUALIFIER_CODE, re.DMR_VALUE_STANDARD_UNITS, re.EXCEEDENCE_PCT, re.LIMIT_BEGIN_DATE, re.LIMIT_END_DATE, re.LIMIT_UNIT_CODE, re.LIMIT_UNIT_DESC, re.LIMIT_VALUE_ID, re.LIMIT_VALUE_NMBR, re.LIMIT_VALUE_QUALIFIER_CODE, re.LIMIT_VALUE_STANDARD_UNITS, re.LIMIT_VALUE_TYPE_CODE, re.MONITORING_LOCATION_CODE, re.NODI_CODE, re.PARAMETER_CODE, re.PARAMETER_DESC, re.STANDARD_UNIT_CODE, re.STANDARD_UNIT_DESC, re.VIOLATION_CODE, re.EXTERNAL_PERMIT_NMBR, re.MONITORING_PERIOD_END_DATE, ee.FAC_NAME, ee.FAC_STREET, ee.FAC_CITY, ee.FAC_STATE, ee.FAC_ZIP, ee.FAC_COUNTY, ee.FAC_EPA_REGION, ee.FAC_LAT, ee.FAC_LONG, ee.FAC_DERIVED_WBD, ee.FAC_DERIVED_CD113, ee.FAC_PERCENT_MINORITY, ee.FAC_POP_DEN, ee.FAC_DERIVED_HUC, ee.FAC_SIC_CODES, ee.FAC_NAICS_CODES, ee.DFR_URL FROM  NPDES_DMRS_FY2022 re,  ECHO_EXPORTER ee,  temp_1 ep  WHERE ((ep.REGISTRY_ID) = (ee.REGISTRY_ID)) AND (ep.PGM_ID = (re.EXTERNAL_PERMIT_NMBR))

SELECT re.NPDES_ID, re.MONITORING_PERIOD_END_DATE, re.RNC_DETECTION_CODE, re.RNC_DETECTION_DESC, re.RNC_RESOLUTION_CODE, re.RNC_RESOLUTION_DESC, re.VIOLATION_CODE, re.VIOLATION_DESC, re.PARAMETER_DESC, re.DMR_VALUE_NMBR, re.EXCEEDENCE_PCT, re.DMR_VALUE_STANDARD_UNITS, ee.FAC_NAME, ee.FAC_STREET, ee.FAC_CITY, ee.FAC_STATE, ee.FAC_ZIP, ee.FAC_COUNTY, ee.FAC_EPA_REGION, ee.FAC_LAT, ee.FAC_LONG, ee.FAC_DERIVED_WBD, ee.FAC_DERIVED_CD113, ee.FAC_PERCENT_MINORITY, ee.FAC_POP_DEN, ee.FAC_DERIVED_HUC, ee.FAC_SIC_CODES, ee.FAC_NAICS_CODES, ee.DFR_URL FROM  NPDES_EFF_VIOLATIONS re,  ECHO_EXPORTER ee,  EXP_PGM ep  WHERE ((ep.PGM = 'NPDES_IDS') AND ((ep.REGISTRY_ID) = (ee.REGISTRY_ID)) AND (ep.PGM_ID = (re.NPDES_ID)))

SELECT re.REPORTING_YEAR, re.REGISTRY_ID, re.PGM_SYS_ACRNM, re.PGM_SYS_ID, re.POLLUTANT_NAME, re.ANNUAL_EMISSION, re.UNIT_OF_MEASURE, re.NEI_TYPE, re.NEI_HAP_VOC_FLAG, ee.FAC_NAME, ee.FAC_STREET, ee.FAC_CITY, ee.FAC_STATE, ee.FAC_ZIP, ee.FAC_COUNTY, ee.FAC_EPA_REGION, ee.FAC_LAT, ee.FAC_LONG, ee.FAC_DERIVED_WBD, ee.FAC_DERIVED_CD113, ee.FAC_PERCENT_MINORITY, ee.FAC_POP_DEN, ee.FAC_DERIVED_HUC, ee.FAC_SIC_CODES, ee.FAC_NAICS_CODES, ee.DFR_URL FROM  POLL_RPT_COMBINED_EMISSIONS re,  ECHO_EXPORTER ee  WHERE (((re.REGISTRY_ID) = (ee.REGISTRY_ID)) AND (re.PGM_SYS_ACRNM = 'E-GGRT'))

SELECT re.ID_NUMBER, re.ACTIVITY_LOCATION, re.ENFORCEMENT_IDENTIFIER, re.ENFORCEMENT_TYPE, re.ENFORCEMENT_DESC, re.ENFORCEMENT_AGENCY, re.ENFORCEMENT_ACTION_DATE, re.PMP_AMOUNT, re.FMP_AMOUNT, re.FSC_AMOUNT, re.SCR_AMOUNT, ee.REGISTRY_ID, ee.FAC_NAME, ee.FAC_STREET, ee.FAC_CITY, ee.FAC_STATE, ee.FAC_ZIP, ee.FAC_COUNTY, ee.FAC_EPA_REGION, ee.FAC_LAT, ee.FAC_LONG, ee.FAC_NAICS_CODES, ee.FAC_DERIVED_WBD, ee.FAC_SIC_CODES, ee.FAC_DERIVED_HUC, ee.FAC_DERIVED_CD113, ee.FAC_PERCENT_MINORITY, ee.FAC_POP_DEN FROM  RCRA_ENFORCEMENTS re,  ECHO_EXPORTER ee,  EXP_PGM ep  WHERE ((ep.PGM = 'RCRA_IDS') AND ((ep.REGISTRY_ID) = (ee.REGISTRY_ID)) AND (ep.PGM_ID = (re.ID_NUMBER)))

SELECT re.ID_NUMBER, re.ACTIVITY_LOCATION, re.EVALUATION_IDENTIFIER, re.EVALUATION_TYPE, re.EVALUATION_DESC, re.EVALUATION_AGENCY, re.EVALUATION_START_DATE, re.FOUND_VIOLATION, ee.FAC_DERIVED_HUC, ee.REGISTRY_ID, ee.FAC_NAME, ee.FAC_STREET, ee.FAC_CITY, ee.FAC_STATE, ee.FAC_ZIP, ee.FAC_COUNTY, ee.FAC_EPA_REGION, ee.FAC_LAT, ee.FAC_LONG, ee.FAC_NAICS_CODES, ee.FAC_SIC_CODES, ee.FAC_DERIVED_WBD, ee.FAC_DERIVED_CD113, ee.FAC_PERCENT_MINORITY, ee.FAC_POP_DEN FROM  RCRA_EVALUATIONS re,  ECHO_EXPORTER ee,  EXP_PGM ep  WHERE ((ep.PGM = 'RCRA_IDS') AND ((ep.REGISTRY_ID) = (ee.REGISTRY_ID)) AND (ep.PGM_ID = (re.ID_NUMBER)))
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW temp_1 AS SELECT * FROM EXP_PGM WHERE PGM = 'RCRA_IDS';

SELECT re.ID_NUMBER, re.ACTIVITY_LOCATION, re.VIOLATION_TYPE, re.VIOLATION_TYPE_DESC, re.VIOL_DETERMINED_BY_AGENCY, re.DATE_VIOLATION_DETERMINED, re.ACTUAL_RTC_DATE, re.SCHEDULED_COMPLIANCE_DATE, ee.FAC_DERIVED_HUC, ee.REGISTRY_ID, ee.FAC_NAME, ee.FAC_STREET, ee.FAC_CITY, ee.FAC_SIC_CODES, ee.FAC_STATE, ee.FAC_ZIP, ee.FAC_COUNTY, ee.FAC_NAICS_CODES, ee.FAC_EPA_REGION, ee.FAC_LAT, ee.FAC_LONG, ee.FAC_DERIVED_WBD, ee.FAC_DERIVED_CD113, ee.FAC_PERCENT_MINORITY, ee.FAC_POP_DEN  FROM RCRA_VIOLATIONS re, ECHO_EXPORTER ee, temp_1 ri WHERE ((ri.REGISTRY_ID) = (ee.REGISTRY_ID)) AND (ri.PGM_ID = (re.ID_NUMBER))

SELECT re.PWSID, re.PWS_NAME, re.CITY_SERVED, re.STATE, re.STATE_NAME, re.PWS_TYPE_CODE, re.PWS_TYPE_SHORT, re.SOURCE_WATER, re.PWS_SIZE, re.POPULATION_SERVED_COUNT, re.FISCAL_YEAR, re.ENFORCEMENT_DATE, re.ENFORCEMENT_CATEGORY, re.DESCRIPTION, re.AGENCY, re.ENFORCEMENT_ID, ee.REGISTRY_ID, ee.FAC_NAME, ee.FAC_STREET, ee.FAC_CITY, ee.FAC_STATE, ee.FAC_ZIP, ee.FAC_COUNTY, ee.FAC_EPA_REGION, ee.FAC_LAT, ee.FAC_LONG, ee.FAC_DERIVED_WBD, ee.FAC_DERIVED_CD113, ee.FAC_PERCENT_MINORITY, ee.FAC_POP_DEN, ee.FAC_DERIVED_HUC, ee.FAC_SIC_CODES, ee.FAC_NAICS_CODES, ee.DFR_URL FROM  SDWA_ENFORCEMENTS re,  ECHO_EXPORTER ee,  EXP_PGM ep  WHERE ((ep.PGM = 'SDWA_IDS') AND ((ep.REGISTRY_ID) = (ee.REGISTRY_ID)) AND (ep.PGM_ID = (re.PWSID)))

SELECT re.PWSID, re.FISCAL_YEAR, re.STATE, re.STATE_NAME, re.EPA_REGION, re.PWS_TYPE_CODE, re.PWS_NAME, re.CITY_SERVED, re.STATE_CODE, re.SOURCE_WATER, re.IS_TRIBAL, re.SYSTEM_SIZE, re.POPULATION_SERVED_COUNT, ee.REGISTRY_ID, ee.FAC_NAME, ee.FAC_STREET, ee.FAC_CITY, ee.FAC_STATE, ee.FAC_ZIP, ee.FAC_COUNTY, ee.FAC_EPA_REGION, ee.FAC_LAT, ee.FAC_LONG, ee.FAC_DERIVED_WBD, ee.FAC_DERIVED_CD113, ee.FAC_PERCENT_MINORITY, ee.FAC_POP_DEN, ee.FAC_DERIVED_HUC, ee.FAC_SIC_CODES, ee.FAC_NAICS_CODES, ee.DFR_URL FROM  SDWA_PUB_WATER_SYSTEMS re,  ECHO_EXPORTER ee,  EXP_PGM ep  WHERE ((ep.PGM = 'SDWA_IDS') AND ((ep.REGISTRY_ID) = (ee.REGISTRY_ID)) AND (ep.PGM_ID = (re.PWSID)))

SELECT re.PWSID, re.PWS_NAME, re.CITY_SERVED, re.STATE, re.STATE_NAME, re.PWS_TYPE_CODE, re.PWS_TYPE_SHORT, re.SOURCE_WATER, re.PWS_SIZE, re.POPULATION_SERVED_COUNT, re.FISCAL_YEAR, re.SERIOUS_VIOLATOR, ee.REGISTRY_ID, ee.FAC_NAME, ee.FAC_STREET, ee.FAC_CITY, ee.FAC_STATE, ee.FAC_ZIP, ee.FAC_COUNTY, ee.FAC_EPA_REGION, ee.FAC_LAT, ee.FAC_LONG, ee.FAC_DERIVED_WBD, ee.FAC_DERIVED_CD113, ee.FAC_PERCENT_MINORITY, ee.FAC_POP_DEN, ee.FAC_DERIVED_HUC, ee.FAC_SIC_CODES, ee.FAC_NAICS_CODES, ee.DFR_URL FROM  SDWA_SERIOUS_VIOLATORS re,  ECHO_EXPORTER ee,  EXP_PGM ep  WHERE ((ep.PGM = 'SDWA_IDS') AND ((ep.REGISTRY_ID) = (ee.REGISTRY_ID)) AND (ep.PGM_ID = (re.PWSID)))

SELECT re.PWSID, re.PWS_NAME, re.CITY_SERVED, re.STATE, re.STATE_NAME, re.PWS_TYPE_CODE, re.PWS_TYPE_SHORT, re.SOURCE_WATER, re.PWS_SIZE, re.POPULATION_SERVED_COUNT, re.FISCAL_YEAR, re.SITE_VISIT_DATE, re.SANITARY_SURVEY, ee.REGISTRY_ID, ee.FAC_NAME, ee.FAC_STREET, ee.FAC_CITY, ee.FAC_STATE, ee.FAC_ZIP, ee.FAC_COUNTY, ee.FAC_EPA_REGION, ee.FAC_LAT, ee.FAC_LONG, ee.FAC_DERIVED_WBD, ee.FAC_DERIVED_CD113, ee.FAC_PERCENT_MINORITY, ee.FAC_POP_DEN, ee.FAC_DERIVED_HUC, ee.FAC_SIC_CODES, ee.FAC_NAICS_CODES, ee.DFR_URL FROM  SDWA_SITE_VISITS re,  ECHO_EXPORTER ee,  EXP_PGM ep  WHERE ((ep.PGM = 'SDWA_IDS') AND ((ep.REGISTRY_ID) = (ee.REGISTRY_ID)) AND (ep.PGM_ID = (re.PWSID)))

SELECT re.PWSID, re.PWS_NAME, re.CITY_SERVED, re.STATE, re.STATE_NAME, re.PWS_TYPE_CODE, re.PWS_TYPE_SHORT, re.SOURCE_WATER, re.PWS_SIZE, re.POPULATION_SERVED_COUNT, re.FISCAL_YEAR, re.VIOLATION_NAME, re.VIOLATION_ID, re.RULE_NAME, re.BEGIN_YEAR, re.END_YEAR, re.RTC_YEAR, re.ACUTE_HEALTH_BASED, re.HEALTH_BASED, re.MONITORING_REPORTING, re.PUBLIC_NOTIF_OTHER, ee.REGISTRY_ID, ee.FAC_NAME, ee.FAC_STREET, ee.FAC_CITY, ee.FAC_STATE, ee.FAC_ZIP, ee.FAC_COUNTY, ee.FAC_EPA_REGION, ee.FAC_LAT, ee.FAC_LONG, ee.FAC_DERIVED_WBD, ee.FAC_DERIVED_CD113, ee.FAC_PERCENT_MINORITY, ee.FAC_POP_DEN, ee.FAC_DERIVED_HUC, ee.FAC_SIC_CODES, ee.FAC_NAICS_CODES, ee.DFR_URL FROM  SDWA_VIOLATIONS re,  ECHO_EXPORTER ee,  EXP_PGM ep  WHERE ((ep.PGM = 'SDWA_IDS') AND ((ep.REGISTRY_ID) = (ee.REGISTRY_ID)) AND (ep.PGM_ID = re.PWSID))

SELECT re.REPORTING_YEAR, re.REGISTRY_ID, re.PGM_SYS_ACRNM, re.PGM_SYS_ID, re.POLLUTANT_NAME, re.ANNUAL_EMISSION, re.UNIT_OF_MEASURE, re.NEI_TYPE, re.NEI_HAP_VOC_FLAG, ee.FAC_NAME, ee.FAC_STREET, ee.FAC_CITY, ee.FAC_STATE, ee.FAC_ZIP, ee.FAC_COUNTY, ee.FAC_EPA_REGION, ee.FAC_LAT, ee.FAC_LONG, ee.FAC_DERIVED_WBD, ee.FAC_DERIVED_CD113, ee.FAC_PERCENT_MINORITY, ee.FAC_POP_DEN, ee.FAC_DERIVED_HUC, ee.FAC_SIC_CODES, ee.FAC_NAICS_CODES, ee.DFR_URL FROM  POLL_RPT_COMBINED_EMISSIONS re,  ECHO_EXPORTER ee  WHERE (((re.REGISTRY_ID) = (ee.REGISTRY_ID)) AND (re.PGM_SYS_ACRNM = 'TRIS'))

SELECT re.NPDES_ID, re.YEARQTR, re.HLRNC, re.NUME90Q, re.NUMCVDT, re.NUMSVCD, re.NUMPSCH, ee.FAC_NAME, ee.FAC_STREET, ee.FAC_CITY, ee.FAC_STATE, ee.FAC_ZIP, ee.FAC_COUNTY, ee.FAC_EPA_REGION, ee.FAC_LAT, ee.FAC_LONG, ee.FAC_DERIVED_WBD, ee.FAC_DERIVED_CD113, ee.FAC_PERCENT_MINORITY, ee.FAC_POP_DEN, ee.FAC_DERIVED_HUC, ee.FAC_SIC_CODES, ee.FAC_NAICS_CODES, ee.DFR_URL FROM  NPDES_QNCR_HISTORY re,  ECHO_EXPORTER ee,  EXP_PGM ep  WHERE ((ep.PGM = 'NPDES_IDS') AND ((ep.REGISTRY_ID) = (ee.REGISTRY_ID)) AND (ep.PGM_ID = (re.NPDES_ID)))
